column3: The ninth child of Miare is born.
column5: Huzzah! More unpaid workforce to continue writing the Chronicle!

column3: The ninth child of Miare is expected to die.
column5: Honestly, never thought she would climb to 39th place during this year's Popularity Vote.
column6: Wh... what? Well, to be fair, she was coughing a bit when she visited last week, but it's neither here nor there...
